side-projects.title: iOS Icon Gallery
side-projects.description: A gallery showcasing great icon designs from the iOS ecosystem. Designed and curated by muah.

side-projects.title: SassMe
side-projects.description: Visualize the result of Sass color functions in real-time without compiling; a tool spawned and created in the Arc90 Lab.

side-projects.title: Team Colors
side-projects.description: A reference for finding the team colors of your favorite major league sports teams.

side-projects.title: CSS Off 2012
side-projects.description: I placed amongst the finalists in a global web design competition by Unmatched Style. Entrants were given a design and provided two weeks to code it. Each entry was then meticulously judged by industry-renowned experts, including Chris Coyier and Ethan Marcotte, on criteria such as code cleanliness, validation, interactions, project size, browser support, and responsiveness.
